name: Spin/Flip
description:
Spin/Flip is a randomly generated 2D shooter game with enemies, bosses, power-ups, and LOTS of bullets.

Music by: arcturus.bandcamp.com

Please keep in mind that the game is still in development, and there may be bugs and other issues.

Controls:

KB+M: WASD to move, LMB to shoot. Hold tab or use number keys to use items. Scroll wheel or e/q keys to switch weapons.

Gamepad: Left stick to move, right stick to shoot. Hold X and press A to use items. Left and right bumpers to switch weapons.

Note that gamepad support is not yet fully implemented, some features might not work properly on all gamepads or all computers.
